name: XploShoot
description:
Make enemies explode and see their pieces flying away!

XploShoot is a 3rd person indie shooter, where you have to reach the final boss, while you make a lot of explosions. You shoot at an enemy and he explodes! You are killed by an enemy and you explode! Do you find an another enemy on your way? Boom! Avoid dangerous obstacles, while running through a blue abstract enviroment. Reach the end and teleport in the next level. But be careful , because somebody is waiting for you at the end!

Here what you will see:

-Make enemies break into pieces

-Teleport to the next area

-Jump over dangerous yellow water

-Avoid various types of obstacles

-Shoot your foes

Are you ready for lots of explosions?

Do you have enough skill to arrive at the end and overcome all threats?

Are you willing to know who is waiting you?

So Download the game and Enjoy it!

F.A.Q

1) Who made this game?

This game is made by SmallFast, an aspiring game developer, who wants to do experience so that one day he will make games for living.

2)What's the quality of his game?

Since he's only a beginner and he's self taught, the quality is not very high, but it can be at least enjoyable as you can see in his other games ( you can search them on my page).

3)Is it a waste of time?

If you are searching for high quality games or well-refined games, maybe this isn't for you. But I can give you a simple and acceptable gameplay experience from which you can have some fun!

4)Do I have to pay in order to play?

No, the game is totally free. But it will be nice if you write a little feedback in the comment so that I can learn from you and improve my skills.
